s1.title: Timeframe
s1.p: This is the current time frame for the next releases:

s1.title: Version 2.2 Milestone 1
s1.p: Although this version might be long in the future, we already have some plans...

ul.li: Move to a new Avalon container implementation (Fortress)

s1.p: The updating to 2.2 document contains more information on how to prepare your application for the next major release.

ul.li:
We have many open
bugs in bugzilla. These must be reviewed and then solved (or declared invalid etc).
Documentation updates (this area lacks most). Documentation must be happening all the time, and not left until last.
Checking what to backport. We have components in the latest developer versions, which might find their way into the bugfix version line (2.0.x).

Ensure that licensing requirements have been met. update jars.xml, ensure proper banner in *.java header, verify the current LICENSE* files, ensure that external components have suitable licensing requirements.
